item.title: ðŸ“Œ Thoughts
item.description: [04.10] Tariff move is necessary to save America The US buys goods from around the world with US dollars. Then with the dollar as a world reserve currency held by so many countries, it is so tempting for the US government to borrow that money. It’s almost like printing money, except that you have to pay interests back later. That’s how the US has accumulated massive amount of debts that is non-sustainable.
